content:
That's great to hear that you visited the modern art museum downtown and found it inspiring! It's always exciting to discover new art and be motivated to create.

Regarding the print you purchased, it's wonderful that you're thinking of getting it framed. A good frame can really elevate the piece and make it a beautiful addition to your home or studio.

The new framing shop on Main St sounds like a great option. Have you checked out their reviews or spoken to anyone who has used their services? It's always a good idea to do a bit of research before entrusting your art to a framer.

Additionally, you might want to consider consulting with the framer about the best way to frame your print. They can offer valuable advice on the type of frame, matting, and glazing that would complement your artwork and protect it from damage.

Once you've got your print framed, I hope you'll enjoy displaying it in your space and drawing inspiration from it!
